name: Sushi Samurai
description:
Help! The  YamaSushi clan is wrecking havoc accross all New Yarn City! We need Mewsashi to help us! 

Sushi Samurai is a 3D Endless runner game in which Mewsashi, an intrepid Samurai, has to capture the Sushi members of the YamaSushi clan! Would you be able to help him?

------

Sushi Samurai is coming to mobile platforms this 2021. Here's a small peek of the Gameplay and the Visual style of the game. Do note that we've just started development on the game (we started on January 2021 :P ), so a lot of things will change and evolve!

We hope you like it, and do let us know if you have any feedback! Every comment is welcome!

Happy Sushiing! ...And thanks for trying the game and/or donating!

------

Controls

A / Left arrow: move left

D / Right arrow: move Right

S / Down arrow: Slide

W / Up arrow: Jump

------

Important. Note about the Web build:

The Web build might work a "little" bit slow and it should fix after the second run. We're currently working on solving the issue. But  in any case we included a zip file with the build for Windows in case you want to test that one out.
